name: Sea Point Ventures
overview:
SeaPoint Ventures invests in early stage communications companies in the wireless, broadband and network transactional infrastructure sectors. The partnershipâ€™s strength is derived from the extensive operational and entrepreneurial backgrounds of the individual partners, as well as its strategic affiliations and strong reputation within the venture capital and wireless communications industries. Partners at SeaPoint actively contribute their experience, relationships and ideas to the firmâ€™s portfolio companies.

SeaPointâ€™s strategy is to lead deals and syndicate with other quality investors. They employ in-depth industry knowledge and operational experience, through board participation and hands-on involvement, into building successful businesses. SeaPoint invests in companies that have the potential to be leaders in large growth markets, with technologies that enable significant market trends to occur, and are typically the first institutional investor in the portfolio companies.
